name: Classic Pancakes
description: Light and fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl
Whisk wet ingredients in another bowl
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form
Flip and cook other side until golden

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a wok or large pan
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry until fragrant
Add vegetables, starting with the firmest ones
Add soy sauce and stir-fry until vegetables are crisp-tender
